name: Mini Meringues
author: K.SUTTON
summary: These crunchy dainties are great with coffee or with cream for dessert. And they're low fat!  Substitute 2 teaspoons instant coffee granules or 1 1/2 tablespoons cocoa for the vanilla if you like.  Coffee kisses are great sandwiched together with melted white or dark chocolate. Spooned vanilla ones are good with cream and chocolate ones are good as finger biscuits with coffee.
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
In large bowl, beat egg whites until stiff, but not dry
Gradually beat in sugar until a little of the mixture between your thumb and forefinger feels smooth, not gritty
Pipe or spoon small portions onto baking tray and bake 35 minutes, or until dry but not brown
Turn off oven and leave meringues to cool inside
